entries.title: Mastodon's Growth Continues, Medium Joins in With its New Community Platform
entries.description: Another win for Mastodon's adoption! Medium launches an instance for its users.

entries.title: FOSS Weekly #23.02: Free Linux Book, Cooler Master Goes Open Source and More
entries.description: I've got a gift for you in this edition of FOSS Weekly. A new Linux book you can download for free.
